original_text: According to all that I shew thee, after the pattern of the tabernacle, and the pattern of all the instruments thereof, even so shall ye make it.
korean_text: 무릇 내가 네게 보이는 모양대로 장막을 짓고 기구들도 그 모양을 따라 지을지니라

sentences.original_text: According to all that I shew thee,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네게 보이는 모든 것에 따라,

sentences.original_text: after the pattern of the tabernacle,
and the pattern of all the instruments thereof,
even so shall ye make it.
